headline: GE HealthCare unveils Freelium, a next-generation sealed magnet platform at ECR 2025 to support equitable and sustainable access to MR
summary: CHICAGO, February 26, 2025--GE HealthCare (Nasdaq: GEHC) today unveiled Freelium™,ii a next-generation sealed magnet platform, that aims to enable high-quality Magnetic Resonance (MR) imaging with less than 1% of helium used in conventional magnet technology to help support diagnostic accuracy and sustainability goals. Debuting at the European Congress of Radiology (ECR), Freelium marks the evolution of GE HealthCare’s established lightweight intelligent platform magnet technology, which was fir

headline: Honeywell: The Wait Is Over, It Is Time To Buy
summary: Honeywell's planned business split simplifies valuation, potentially unlocking significant shareholder value. Learn why HON stock is a Buy.
